details.message: CT - The Alternative Payment Model (APM) Entity Identifier is not valid.  Here is a link to the IG section on identifiers: https://ecqi.healthit.gov/sites/default/files/2020-CMS-QRDA-III-Eligible-Clinicians-and-EP-IG-v1.1-508.pdf#page=15

CT - The numerator id 9306E83B-3C3B-4CDF-B3EA-F99AEFC55F87 has a count value that is greater than the denominator and/or the performance denominator (Denominator count - Denominator exclusion count - Denominator Exception count)
